content: This a brilliant tool. It converts volumes, weights, lengths, and temperatures, such as cups to tablespoons and celcius to Fahrenheit. It multiplies and divides recipes. It will tell you that a large egg equals a little under a quarter cup, that your turkey should cook to an internal temp of 165, and that the second gas mark on your stove controls makes a 300-degree flame. I often use this when I cook and use it every time I bake.
Almost perfect app. Just missing a few ingredients in their calculator, such as castor sugar and dark brown sugar. Wonder if there's a list of ingredients that could be added to the next update?
replyContent:
Hello Ben,

Thanks for providing the feedback! We are in the process of re-designing our app, which includes a search feature to find ingredients. If there are any ingredients you would like to see in the future update, please do not hesitate to contact us and let us know. You can reach us at support@mykitchencalculator.com.

content: It's help me a lot..thanks
Waited over 5 minutes for this to download and install. Cancel. Refund. Bye.
replyContent: Hi Paul. The downloading of the app is controlled by the Google Play store and not the app developer. The file size is small and should not take 5 minutes to download. Please reach out to us at support@mykitchencalculator.com and we can help to troubleshoot why the app is not downloading on your device.

content: Not what I was hoping for, first test was copying and pasting a curry recipe. I wanted to double it and it did. However just doubling up on spices when making something like a curry doesn't work like that. The other functions you can find on free websites, its handy but it's just a calculator
replyContent: Hello Simon. Sorry to hear the app did not meet your expectations. Although it is just a calculator, the area where this app shines is the ability to convert by ingredient quantity and ability to convert quickly from ingredient weights to cups and spoons.  Please feel free to contact us and we can send  you an example on how to use these features.

content: I've always struggle multiplying recipes for work especially with 10 plus ingredients (I'm a dummy) this app makes it a breeze, you put all your ingredients in with the measurements/quantities Infront and hey presto it's all done in the correct measurements. You also get 8 other options for all things cooking related.
I use this app nearly every time I cook. It's indispensable.
Pretty decent, does the job

Ask it to divide 2 lbs 13 oz by 6. It gives back 1/3 lb 13 oz. Mathematically incorrect. Any ingredient that has two units (lbs, oz) it will only divide the first one and simply leave the 2nd untouched. It will still display it like it divided it, though, leading you to mess up your recipie before you realize what went wrong.
replyContent: Hello Ben.  It will convert the 13 oz if you place a "##" in front of it (##13 oz).  Because recipes are formatted in a variety of ways, the converter only converts the first number in the line.  It will also convert numbers marked with a "##" in front of it.  Please email us or click on the support button.  We can help with more examples.

content: Easy to use.
graet app

I was pleasantly surprised at how well this app functions. The list of ingredients for weight conversion was extensive. The ability to copy and paste recipes into the recipe converter is a great feature. I found the scaling of recipe ingredients is more accurate using weight than volume. A useful addition to the cooking temperature feature would be bakery items for bread, muffins, etc. This app is most certainly worth the small price you pay.
I had trouble understanding the program but finally figured it out.  Patience is a virtue.  I wanted to multiply the recipe and it worked.
replyContent: Hello Fay.  Thank you for the review.  We apologize if there is a slight learning curve to the app.  The support button on the home screen should take you to a how-to section that will guide you through how to use the app.  Also, please feel free to contact us at anytime if you have any questions and we will try to support you as best as we can.

content: Not enough information to be really useful. I tried to uninstall and get my refund but the app refused. It had no trouble taking my money.
replyContent: Hello Therese,  We apologize if the refund was not given to you.  Unfortunately, the refund/purchase is managed by the Google Play store, please contact Google Play for a refund.  If you would like to learn to use the app, you can press the support button or contact us at support@mykitchencalculator.com.  We will be more than happy to help!

content: I used it to resize a recipe to a larger amount, and it worked perfectly. The support you can get is equally as good.
If you convert recipes often, this app is a must have. Nice layout and easy to use. Nice to have a cooking temperature reference also.

I bought and downloaded this app because I thought it included the function to paste a recipe in, say, US measuments, and get the metric equivalent as an output. But it doesn't do that. If this was incorporated this app would be very good and stand out from all the other apps (that I have seen) in the same genre. Uninstalling as I have no use for it as it it now.
replyContent:
Hello Jorgen,

We apologize if the recipe converter tool wasn't able to automatically convert your pasted recipe from US to metric units. The app comes with unit conversion tools that can convert between US and metric. You can manually convert units and paste back into the recipe converter. We are currently studying how to make this process easier.

content: List of recent apps has one for each converter plus start page which is weird. When entering values, opens full keyboard rather than just numeric. Can't search or filter ingredients. Would be nice if default ingredient listed could be selected (like something you convert regularly) rather than agave syrup because it's alphabetical. BUT, decent layout, most accurate ingredient conversions, and most comprehensive, detailed list of ingredients. Cooking temp is handy. Substitute guide would be nice addition.
replyContent:
Hello Ricardo,

Firstly, we apologize for the late response.  We've been working to address some of the items you've listed above.  We've added a fraction keyboard and made improvements to the app navigation in the latest version, 4.0.  As for other features, we will study these.  We greatly appreciate your review.

content: Try to split a large batch recipe that I use at work and it won't break the recipe down
replyContent:
Hi Matthew, 

Sorry to hear that the app did not break the recipe down.  The recipe converter is very sensitive to text formatting and this may be the cause of the issue.  Please visit the support section for details.  If that does not help, please contact us at: support@mykitchencalculator.com and we can provide further support.

content: I use this every time I cook for my family, it makes multiplying the recipe so much easier and consistent
This is easy to use and is very helpful when your baking small batches.
Very useful for the kitchen cook. Highly recommended, great multiplier.
